title: Which K-pop group deserves more popularity? - Quora

response.answer_text: This question screams Berry Good.  They are a 5-member group that debuted in 2014 with the single ‘Love Letter’. A year after their debut, 3 members left to focus on their studies. As members departed and members were added, it caused the lineup to change a lot over time. In 2016, Berry Good held a fundraiser to help pay for the production of their first EP and thus ‘Angel’ was born.  You may have seen me share this a while back and it’s still as big a masterpiece as it was then. They each have such strong vocals, Gowoon definitely shone in this song. Speaking of which, allow me to introduce the members: - Johyun  First things first, body goals. Johyun is the main rapper, lead dancer and of course, the visual. After living in the States for a couple of years, she became fluent in English. You may also recognize her from MIXNINE, she ranked 24th. Super wholesome human being too. - Seoyul  As you can see, Seoyul is equally gorgeous. She is the main dancer and lead vocalist of Berry Good. You may know her sister, she’s Yuna from AOA! From what I’ve seen, Seoyul is definitely the most friendly and outgoing. - Daye  (It’s her birthday today!) Daye is absolutely lovely. She is the lead vocalist and rapper of the group. She’s one of those idols who have very natural aegyo but are absolute queens on stage. Though she could be considered the “most problematic of the group”, her personality is amazing and you can definitely tell she’s grown since then. - Sehyung  Sehyung is the lead rapper, vocalist and the FOTG. She is also an actress! She was cast in a web drama with fellow idols Binnie (OMG) and Kriesha Chu last November. Her visuals are adorable and highkey reminds me of Xiumin from EXO. - Gowoon  She is the main vocalist and the youngest of the group. She’s like me, she lights up the mood in an instant. She speaks English as well as Korean and she is actually the only member left from the original lineup. She is so freaking talented, her voice is… omg. She’s the one who sings the high notes in ‘Angel’.  They don’t have a set concept because they’ve changed so much but that goes to show Berry Good can pull off any concept they want. Other than ‘Angel’ which is definitely a must-listen, some other good songs of theirs are ‘Don’t believe’, ‘Mellow Mellow’ and my personal favorite, ‘Oh! Oh!’:  These girls are mucho talented and mucho not talked about enough. Please support them and listen to some of their stuff, they’re more than amazing. ~flav.r

FOR ME these are 7 kpop groups that deserve more popularity: 1.Dreamcatcher  Their concept is unique (they actually are a rock group) and their videos fantastic. Siyeon (the Main Vocalist) is such a good vocalist, SuA is one of tge greatest main dancers, Dami has a good rap and in general every member is wow.I am still thinking why they aren’t successful. 2.Loona  Loona is already popular, specially in America, but I think their popularity is not so much. They have an amazing concept (watch “Butterfly” video), they are the funniest idols and are something magic that deserves a better recognition. 3.Gwsn  Damn they are so underrated. “Red Sun” is a BOP, but all their songs are bops. An incredible group. 💝 4.Cherry Bullet  It’s just a rookie group, but it looks like a senior group, that has already lost 3 members. I wish they will become more famous in the future (if there will be a happy future for the world). 5.Clc  One question:Why? Why is CLC underrated? They have everything and their last comebacks are beautiful. 6.Stray Kids  Finally a boy group. I know Stray Kids is already famous internationally but Korea sleeps on them and their last comebacks. They worked and work so hard really! 7.The Boys  Stan these guys! 👍 Ps.I know every group is talented and deserve the success it has or that it need to have, these are only my favourite 7 from the big underrated category.

iKON : They really deserve better. B.I.’s departure was truly heart breaking and honestly he was the backbone of the group, the group is not the same without him but they are an amazing group even without him and I wish to see them prosper and succeed in the future! Also hope the same for B.I. Monsta X : Another criminally underrated group mannnn. PLEASE STOP SLEEPING ON MONSTA X’S TALENT Y'ALL. They have some really catchy and beautiful songs like Beautiful, Hero, Follow, Who Do you Love, Shoot Out and so many more. Also their English discography is as good as popular western songs if not better. They're an all rounded group! GOT7 : They recieved their first daesang after 6 years although in my opinion, they should have gotten it way before and they're really worthy of more recognition and the mistreatment they get from JYPE is honestly heart breaking because at the end of the day, Got7 is not only some of the best people on earth but also one of the best groups in kpop talent wise. Stop sleeping on got7. The Boyz : I am not a big fan of them as for now but they have some really really good songs like Giddy Up, No Air (my personal favorite) and their visuals oml…they remind of a rookie version of EXO because they're also 12 like EXO was once (sadly Hwall left in 2019 though). That's all for now, I will expand the list if I remember some other well deserving groups. :) Please give these groups a chance, listen to their songs if you haven't already, you won't regret it! :)

VictonThere are honestly really talented and I like their songs a lot. And they are the cutest family🥺 2. Golden child Okay okay they are getting quite popular these days but I stan them a long time and I always wondered why people keep sleeping on such talent! They are the most talented group I've seen and you can check it for yourself but they can do anything. 3. Pentagon Even tho I don't really stan yet, WHY DO YALL KEEP SLEEPING ON THEM. I was so shook when I found out they didn't had a first win yet while shine was one of the most ICONIC songs ever. I even heard it playing in a shop in my country. Like??? And the fact that they still don't have a win breaks my heart. And the worst thing is that a lot of people know them but are saying things like “they don't seem very interesting” 4. Dreamcather Okay listen, these girls are amazing periodt. I love their songs so fkng much so they need more appreciation. I might edit this later when I think of more groups. Soo DON'T SLEEP ON TALENT tyyy

E’LASTThey’re a rookie group, but their songs are such good quality. They are more of a vocal group, the boys can really sing live. Please check out their debut song, “Swear”. It has a mysterious vibe to it, and it doesn’t sound like your regular K-Pop song. ONEUSONEUS is a group full of talented idols, but they barley receive any recognition. I stumbled upon one of their songs and I’m so glad I did. I fell in love first listen, and I’m sure you will too. Please give them a chance! DAY6You’ve probably heard of this group before, but have you ever listen to their songs? Because they are more of a rock band than an idol group, they aren’t as well known. Instead of dancing, they play instruments! The members are hilarious and relatable. Sorry for not writing much! I can’t really think of any at the moment. If I do, I’ll add them! I was going to put Stray Kids, but they’re actually pretty well known after they released their comeback. Have a good day/night ^^
PENTAGON  BLACK6IX  CIX  DREAMCATCHER  WAYV  ONEUS  ATEEZ  PLT  1TEAM  ASTRO  DKB  BXK  MCND

For me, It’s SEVENTEEN. They’re the most dedicated Kpop group I’ve ever know (personal observation). Good Singer (i mean in Live). 2. Perfect choreography/dancers  3. Rappers   4. Entertainer  5. idk, but they’re talented.  Thank you!
I think 1TEAM deserves more recognition. They’re a new group, but their entire discography SLAPS.  Listen to Vibe, their debut song, and you’ll see what I mean!
All Because of those fucking companies stress work they put on them
